title: PMS 2.0 560 - Urban Meyer Fired In Jacksonville, Thursday Night Football Preview, Charles Barkley, Michael Lombardi, Ian Rapoport, Chuck Pagano, & AJ Hawk
description: Today's show is absolutely LOADED. Pat, AJ, and the boys preview tonight's Thursday Night Football game between the Chiefs and the Chargers and the superboost available only on FanDuel, plus chat about Urban Meyer officially being canned in Jacksonville and all the fallout from that and what happens next for Shad Khan and the Jaguars. We also have several INCREDIBLE guests joining the show to chat about everything going on in the sports world including 2x Hall of Famer, NBA MVP, member of the Dream Team and analyst on Inside the NBA on TNT, Charles Barkley (1:06:33-1:35:00), former GM of the Cleveland Browns, accomplished author, host of the GM Shuffle Podcast, Michael Lombardi (45:25-1:06:31), NFL Insider and friend of the program, Ian Rapoport (24:55-43:22), and former Head Coach of the Indianapolis Colts, Chuck Pagano, for a Coach us Up Chuck on a Thursday (1:36:47-2:11:11). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, come and laugh with us, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
